title: Large-Scale: Short-Intensive Technology- and Inquiry-Based Language Teaching Methodology Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Intensive training for pre-service and in-service teachers on language education methods using inquiry-based pedagogy in mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can design technology-based inquiry activities and apply them to language instruction.
Learners can measure comprehension levels using formative assessment tools in mobile microlearning environments.
Learners can share inquiry-based lesson examples with peer teachers using collaborative learning strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
